quote: “Look! I have made you insignificant among the nations; You are utterly despised.
and to Apʹphi·a our sister, and to Ar·chipʹpus our fellow soldier, and to the congregation that is in your house:
because of the truth that remains in us and will be with us forever.
Beloved one, I pray that in all things you continue to prosper and enjoy good health, just as you are now prospering.
May mercy and peace and love be increased to you.
